about_the_game:
Put it Here is a casual puzzle gameplay that includes item storage, arrangement, packaging, and organization. Players can enjoy the satisfaction and achievement brought by immersively organizing the desktop or stacking and arranging scattered items.
Game features:




Place items in the center of the screen.
Discover the laws in the puzzles and arrange them neatly according to certain laws by dragging and dropping items.
In the packaging theme, different items are classified and placed and then packaged.
A variety of games, a variety of themes and a variety of solutions.
Each puzzle has prompts, and you can control the degree of disclosure of the prompts on your own

short_description: "Put it Here" is a casual puzzle gameplay that includes item storage, arrangement,Here players need to place scattered items according to certain rules. A variety of interesting and healing levels are waiting for you to unlock!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
